DOC.brief_title: Prevention Program Promoting Self Resilience , Positive Self-Image Body Image Among Adolescence Aged 15-17
DOC.detailed_description: Participants set Two high school recruit study , school class grade 9th 10th chosen participate study mixed gender class . The two high school northern Israel , one rural area second small city , serve Jewish population . The size school similar . All data collect within school setting . Program description `` Towards resilient self '' interactive , cognitive behavior program aim address low resilience , low self-esteem body dissatisfaction . The program contain range cop strategy help adolescent improve resilience , self-esteem body image . The program consist nine 90-min session deliver one group leader presence class ' teacher . Participants control group receive one session 90 minute health nutrition education .
DOC.criteria: Participants fill questionnaire program , parent sign letter agreement Participants complete questionnaire least twice
